Business: We are a rapidly growing independent provider of hydraulic fracturing services to onshore oil and natural gas E&P companies in North America.Â We provide our services primarily in the Permian Basin, the DJ Basin, the Williston Basin and the Powder River Basin and expect to deploy one or more fleets for customers in the Eagle Ford Shale in the second half of 2017. Our customer base includes a broad range of E&P companies, including Extraction Oil & Gas, Inc., SM Energy Company, Centennial Resource Development, Inc., Continental Resources, Inc., Devon Energy Corporation, Noble Energy, Inc. and Anadarko Petroleum Corporation.
